title: Renewable Energy
text: Research on the development and optimization of renewable energy technologies such as solar, wind, and geothermal power, including the study of materials, devices, and systems.

title: Energy Storage
text: search on the development of energy storage systems, such as batteries and thermal storage, to enable the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid and improve reliability.

title: Energy Efficiency
text: Research on ways to improve energy efficiency in buildings, appliances, transportation, and industrial processes, such as the use of smart controls, advanced insulation, and high-efficiency motors.

title: Carbon Capture and Storage
text: Research on technologies that can capture carbon dioxide from power plants and other industrial sources and store it underground, to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

title: Electric Transportation
text: Research on the development of electric vehicles, charging infrastructure, and energy-efficient transportation systems.

title: Grid Modernization
text: Research on the integration of renewable energy sources, energy storage, and demand response into the electric grid, including the development of advanced control systems, communication networks, and data analytics.

title: Building Science
text: Research on the design, construction, and operation of energy-efficient buildings and building systems, such as heating, ventilation, and air-conditioning systems, insulation, and lighting.

title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine learning
text: Research on the development of advanced algorithms, models, and tools for monitoring and controlling energy systems, forecasting demand and optimizing the energy system performance.

title: Environmental Impact
text: Research on the environmental impact of energy systems, including the study of air and water pollution, land use, and biodiversity, and the development of sustainable energy solutions.
